column5: Well if my luck revolving around the Olympics holds... we're in for a huge snowstorm...  I'm taking the plow off my 4-wheeler today...
Rumour has it everything you do is premature.
Here I thought I'd misread the weather network!  Michael
Good one!!!  T.J. please leave the plow on for another couple of weeks!!
I swear if it snows you are coming here and plowing my driveway....

That's cool. Me? I've got an uncanny ability to produce monsoon-like rains on demand by simply pitching a tent. I swear on my extended 4 month trip in the bush people were building arks. Farmers should pay me for my services when drought hits.
Have you been picking mushrooms?
careful how you word that...
Anybody that lives down in the Woodstock/London/Kitchener area can thank me for the lack of snow this year.  I bought snow tires for the first time in my life, LOL!
LOL...  ok ok....   hahahaha  I quit.... I quit...
You don't suppose TJ started this post to get OUT of removing the plow...? Nah, he wouldn't do that!  Michael
I'm a little slow on the uptake but I get it now.  If I created rain every time I pitched your kind of tent we'd be living in some kind of weird futuristic water world ruled by dolphins.
Snowing like mad here now...I hear its moving your way
LOL.. Thats even funnier...
I dunno how far north you guys are, but southern ON is forecasting Rain ...ALOT of Rain from Friday to Monday with daytime Temps in the 5-10C range,..bring on them Chromers !!!
you mean smelts right?
Lol, yep smelts!!!
I pulled the cord on my snow blower to clear the last dump of snow, and the cord snapped. I figured that was sure sign of a tuff March to come....hope I'm wrong
I sold my snow blower last week, brace yourselves for snowy armageddon.
Put my snowmachine to sleep!.....OOPS!
There used to be a saying about March  " In like a lion , out like a lamb  In like a lamb, out like a lion "  Lion is warming up his vocal chords, the roar is coming.
If you take that plow off before Saturday 7 am, I'm hunting you down buddy!!!!!!! what goes around. comes around.
My garage is now an absolute mess and with the snow melt I have room to park 2 cars in the drive way...if it snows TJ you're driving down here, cleaning out my garage and shovelling my drive way!
No worries TJ...It won't be your fault...I'm taking the snow tires off my van, LOL!!!!
